name: Escape from Castle Johore
description:
In an alternate universe where Johor has access to steam machinery. The Sultan desperate for Puteri Gunung Ledang to be his wife, uses his vast magical prowess and technological know-how to imprison her until she accepts his proposal. Now the princess must escape the palace using a magical box her mother left her.

The objective of the game is to reach the end of the level to escape. There are patrolling guards and a Hang Tuah Colossus with locked doors preventing the princess from escaping. The player can use the box to hide from guards and open doors by activating them with the box. If the player is caught by a guard, they will instantly die.

Pupperty Studios are a team of developers hoping to create great games as a team.
